name: Thoma's Grocery List
description:
You receive a commission to do grocery shopping...

Description:

After Thoma escaped the Vision Hunt Decree's capture, he needed to catch up with his work as the Housekeeper of the Kamisato Clan after spending days in hiding. He had too many tasks on his hands, so he approached you to help him buy the groceries needed for the Kamisato Household, promising to reward you afterwards. You were grateful for his help before, so you accept.
